Text:
Perfect! Thanks for still posting the AVI version for those of us who did not like the change to other formats :) 
I will seed for a longer while, until there are more seeders than leechers ;)
I Personal Dont Like The Change In Format The AVI Is The Best
Thanks for avi with 640x360, for all of us who watch this in crappy home cinamas and other devices that don't read a lot of formats
